About me

Junior web developer | Front-end developer | Back-end developer

I am the passionate individual in love with codding. Transforming dreams and good ideas into reality and creating websites that works and looks amazing is my specialty.

I am self-motivated, precise, and I highly respect deadlines. Also, I indeed enjoy problem-solving and finding creative solutions and explanations using logic.

Coding skills: html, css, javascript, php, mysql, relational database, react, laravel, resfulapi, wordpress, drupal
